Templates.helpDescription:
Basic Calendar.
This calendar is used for DatePickers
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.Calendar

Templates.helpDescription: Calendar with dates displayed in one line.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.CalendarDateInterval

Templates.helpDescription: A legend for the Calendar Control. Displays special dates colors with their corresponding description. The aggregation specialDates can be set herefor.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend

Templates.helpDescription: Item to be displayed in a CalendarLegend.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegendItem

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.unified.ContentSwitcher({
	id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID
	animation: None, // string
	activeContent: 1, // int
	content1: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	content2: [] // sap.ui.core.Control
})
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.ContentSwitcher

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.unified.Currency({
	id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID
	value: 0, // float
	currency: undefined, // string
	maxPrecision: 3, // int
	useSymbol: true // boolean
})
Templates.helpDescription: A text view which displays currency values and aligns them at the separator
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.Currency

Templates.helpDescription: Date range for use in DatePicker
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.DateRange

Templates.helpDescription: Date range with calendar day type information. Used to visualize special days in the Calendar.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.DateTypeRange

Templates.helpDescription: The framework generates an input field and a button with text "Browse ...". The API supports features such as on change uploads (the upload starts immediately after a file has been selected), file uploads with explicit calls, adjustable control sizes, text display after uploads, or tooltips containing complete file paths.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader

Templates.helpDescription: Represents a parameter for the FileUploader which is rendered as a hidden inputfield.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.FileUploaderParameter

Templates.helpDescription: A container for menu items. When the space in the browser is not large enough to display all defined items, a scroll bar is provided.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.Menu

Templates.helpDescription: Smallest unit in the menu hierarchy. An item can be a direct part of a menu bar, of a menu, or of a sub menu.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.MenuItem

Templates.helpDescription: Provides the standard properties for menu items.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.MenuItemBase

Templates.helpDescription:
Menu item which contains an text field. This menu item is e.g. helpful for filters.
The aggregation 'submenu' (inherited from parent class) is not supported for this type of menu item.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.MenuTextFieldItem

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.unified.Shell({
	id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID
	showPane: false, // boolean
	headerHiding: false, // boolean
	headerVisible: true, // boolean
	icon: undefined, // sap.ui.core.URI
	showCurtain: undefined, // boolean
	showCurtainPane: undefined, // boolean
	searchVisible: true, // boolean, since 1.18
	content: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	paneContent: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	header: "", // sap.ui.core.Control
	canvasSplitContainer: "", // sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer
	curtainSplitContainer: "", // sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer
	curtainContent: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	curtainPaneContent: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	headItems: [], // sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem
	headEndItems: [], // sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem
	search: "", // sap.ui.core.Control
	user: "", // sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadUserItem since 1.22.0
})
Templates.helpDescription:
The shell control is meant as root control (full-screen) of an application.
It was build as root control of the Fiori Launchpad application and provides the basic capabilities
for this purpose. Do not use this control within applications which run inside the Fiori Lauchpad and
do not use it for other scenarios than the root control usecase.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.Shell

Templates.helpDescription: Header Action item of the Shell.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem

Templates.helpDescription: User Header Action Item of the Shell.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadUserItem

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.unified.ShellLayout({
	id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID
	showPane: false, // boolean
	headerHiding: false, // boolean
	headerVisible: true, // boolean
	content: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	paneContent: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	header: "", // sap.ui.core.Control
	canvasSplitContainer: "", // sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer
	curtainSplitContainer: "" // sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer
})
Templates.helpDescription:
The shell layout is the base for the shell control which is meant as root control (full-screen) of an application.
It was build as root control of the Fiori Launchpad application and provides the basic capabilities
for this purpose. Do not use this control within applications which run inside the Fiori Lauchpad and
do not use it for other scenarios than the root control usecase.
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.ShellLayout

Templates.helpDescription: ShellOverlay to be opened in front of a sap.ui.unified.Shell
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.ShellOverlay

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer({
	id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID
	showSecondaryContent: undefined, // boolean
	secondaryContentSize: "250px", // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
	secondaryContentWidth: "250px", // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
	orientation: sap.ui.core.Orientation.Horizontal, // sap.ui.core.Orientation, since 1.22.0
	content: [], // sap.ui.core.Control
	secondaryContent: [] // sap.ui.core.Control
})
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer

Templates.helpDescription:
renders a row of days with ItemNavigation
This is used inside the calendar. Not for stand alone usage
If used inside the calendar the properties and aggregation are directly taken from the parent
(To not duplicate and sync DateRanges and so on...)
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.calendar.DatesRow

Templates.helpDescription:
renders a calendar header
This is used inside the calendar. Not for stand alone usage
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Header

Templates.helpDescription:
renders a month with ItemNavigation
This is used inside the calendar. Not for stand alone usage
If used inside the calendar the properties and aggregation are directly taken from the parent
(To not duplicate and sync DateRanges and so on...)
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month

Templates.helpDescription:
renders a MonthPicker with ItemNavigation
This is used inside the calendar. Not for stand alone usage
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.calendar.MonthPicker

Templates.helpDescription:
renders a YearPicker with ItemNavigation
This is used inside the calendar. Not for stand alone usage
Templates.name: sap.ui.unified.calendar.YearPicker
